attributes.action: remove petitions where no right of reply is allowed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition exists asking the PM to lobby the football league to remove the 15 point deduction from Leeds United.
A counter petition asking for the 15 point deduction to stay is not being allowed onto this petition website, as it breaks current rules.
However, this is a failure of democracy at the heart of government as surely if one point of view is being allowed, the opposite must also be given a chance.
We therefore petition to either
a) allow a petition for the 15 point deduction to stay    OR
b) remove the Leeds United Official Petition immediately

rejection.details: The petition in question was accepted some time ago. We are now more consistent in applying our criteria and in time such petitions will filter out of the petitions system.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
